chunks.en: English Cutter, an AI-powered English sentence learning tool.

chunks.zh:
网址是 www.wordflow.click

有人说，想要学会音标必须开口读单词，想要学会单词必须理解句子，这跟机器学习语言的方法类似，机器不翻字典，也不背单词，想要让机器理解词意，只需要让他看到这个单词在句子中怎么用就可以了，著名的遮蔽语言模型（ MLM ）就是把单词遮住，让机器看前后文来反推词意。
chunks.en:
The website is www.wordflow.click

Some say that to learn phonetics, you must pronounce words; to learn words, you must understand sentences. This is similar to how machines learn languages. Machines don't look up dictionaries or memorize words. To make a machine understand the meaning of a word, you only need to show it how the word is used in a sentence. The famous masked language model (MLM) hides the word and lets the machine look at the context to infer the meaning.

chunks.zh: 而今天多数给人用的英语学习软件，尽管给出了例句，但也都是通过反复看单词来记忆，于是我做了一个完全基于句子的记忆软件。
chunks.en: However, most English learning software for people today, although providing example sentences, relies on repeated viewing of words for memorization. So, I created a sentence-based memory software.

chunks.zh:
## 1.用切割机理解英语句子

上学的时候遇到的一个问题，就是记了很多遍英语单词，也学过很多次语法，但总是看不懂长难句，后来开始实践通过句子学英语，那时就开始用一种方法去拆解句子，把复杂的长句子分解成主干和修饰成分，来理清句子结构。大概规则就是识别出来从句、短语和非谓语动词这三个长的结构，然后标注词性把形容词和副词找出来，最后标注并列结构。
chunks.en:
## 1. Understand English Sentences with Cutter

One problem I encountered when I was in school was that I had memorized English words many times and learned grammar many times, but I still couldn't understand long and difficult sentences. Later, I started practicing learning English through sentences, and I started using a method to break down sentences, decomposing complex long sentences into main components and modifiers to clarify the sentence structure. The general rule is to identify three long structures: clauses, phrases, and non-finite verbs, then mark the parts of speech to find adjectives and adverbs, and finally mark parallel structures.

chunks.zh: 具体的方法，b 站上有个[前新东方老师]( https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1TY4y1W7aZ/)讲解的不错，大家可以去看看。
chunks.en: For the specific method, a former New Oriental teacher on Bilibili [前新东方老师](https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV1TY4y1W7aZ/) has a good explanation, you can check it out.

chunks.zh: 实践下来确实有效，但是拆解句子这个过程，需要花费很多时间，而且在学习过程中，想要精准识别各种从句、短语和非谓语动词，对于初学者来说，这个过程还是比较困难的。
chunks.en: Practice has proven it to be effective, but the process of breaking down sentences takes a lot of time. Moreover, in the learning process, accurately identifying various clauses, phrases, and non-finite verbs is quite difficult for beginners.

chunks.zh: 于是，我做了一个工具，可以自动识别句子中的从句、短语和非谓语动词，并标注词性，这样就可以节省很多时间，而且可以更准确地理解句子结构。
chunks.en: Therefore, I created a tool that can automatically identify clauses, phrases, and non-finite verbs in sentences and mark the parts of speech, which can save a lot of time and allow for a more accurate understanding of sentence structure.

## 2. 练习切割后的句子

用上面的方法把句子拆分之后，顺手做了个练习功能，就是遮住所有单词，根据音标、中文意思，来默写单词的意思。
chunks.en:
![演示 gif1]( https://i.imgur.com/5mrhfqx.gif)

## 2. Practice Cut Sentences

After splitting the sentences using the above method, I conveniently created an exercise function, which is to cover all the words and dictate the meaning of the words according to the phonetics and Chinese meaning.
